info.name: Dark Neon Slack
info.description:
Make slack glow as though it is made with neon signs

Inspired by the full theme shown at https://atom.io/packages/glowing-cursor

This is a dark theme for Slack
info.additionalInfo:
This is a re-color and edit of dlocky12's slack dark fixed:

https://userstyles.org/styles/116746/slack-dark-fixed


source code also available at https://github.com/Matthew-Smith/neon-slack
